thread.title: Outdoor smoking ban

author: Drastic Measures
title: Outdoor smoking ban
text:
I find the smell of coffee more objectionable than the smell of cigarettes.
I don’t dance better from smoking, so no
There. What do you make of that!
be interesting to figure out how much of tolerating people doing things you dislike/that are bad is actually good. That would be a great discussion we should have on here sometime
TikTok phone use at full volume is the UK’s single biggest preventable cause of death, killing two-thirds of long-term users and causing 80,000 deaths every year.
TikTok phone use at full volume is the UK’s single biggest preventable cause of death, killing two-thirds of long-term users and causing 80,000 deaths every year.
Better?
Would some statistics help?
From the ONS:
please lets just remember it’s not even an actual policy proposal at this point
do something more fun with your afternoon
or get back to work1!!!
I’m going for a walk around the fields, hope everyone here has a nice time too
Don’t really understand the problem with the smell of smoke it’s not even bad (and I’m not a smoker). Dunno why people act like a bit of smoke near them is like being pelted with sewage either.
